channel.title: Application on Phuoc's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Application on Phuoc's Blog

item.title: Dashboard Resume
item.description: In the last couple of days, I had a lot of questions about my Data Visualisation skills. So I decided to build a Dashboard Resume and show off some skills :) Check it out: https://iPhuoc.github.io/dashboard/?utm_source=blog It’s not finished yet tho xD

item.title: My Application Video
item.description: I decided to make an application video Check it out (in German): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZZGBpcEE9nE

item.title: SBK Case Study
item.description: Last Week I applied at SBK (Siemens Betriebskrankenkasse) as a Data Scientist. After a telehone Interview, I offered them to do a Case Study to prove my skills. Check it out: The presentation https://rpubs.com/iPhuoc/sbk_case_study The Dashboard http://rpubs.com/iPhuoc/sbk_case_study_dashboard

item.title: Adidas Case Study
item.description: UPDATE I had to take everything down Yesss! In November I applied at Adidas as a Data Scientist. After a telephone Interview, they gave me a Case Study. Check it out: My Report https://rpubs.com/iPhuoc/adidas_case The presentation https://rpubs.com/iPhuoc/adidas_case_presentation The Dashboard http://rpubs.com/iPhuoc/adidas_case_study_dashboard and i also currently working on a Webpage https://iphuoc.github.io/adidas-case-study/?utm_source=Phuoc_Blog
